ProductInfo.Features:
Latest Google Android 4.2 Jelly Bean OS, Allwinner A20 Dual Core CPU (1.2GHz) with Quad core Mali-400 MP GPU, offer unprecedented fast surfing online, video playing and 3D games playing experience
10.1 inch secren display, 5 point capacitive touch screen, 1024*600 resolution.
With front & back dual cameras (0.3MP & 2MP), be adequate for skype video chat and taking general picturesdroid tablet
8GB storage capacity, built-in micro sd card slots, can be expanded to 32GB
Built-in 3.7V 6000mAh Li-Polymer rechargeable battery, enjoy longer running time (almost 3 days for stand-by status)
ProductInfo.Name: E-passion 10.1 Inch Android Tablet Pc, 4.2 Jelly Bean Os, Dual Core, Allwinner A20 Cpu, Dual Cameras, 5 Point Capacitive Touch Screen, 8gb Storage, White Color
